Uses of Class
org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.display.WindowSize

  • Packages that use WindowSize 
    Package Description
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.display
    Package for objects relating to display and ui when the 3D game is running.
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.settings
    Package for Objects responsible for setting and saving game settings into SwissCheese/settings folder.
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows
    This package contains all classes for Swing windows of the user interface (such as menus).
